name: here_for_change
description: A public participation platform at your local level.

scripts.db-dump-demo-data: docker-compose run --rm web python manage.py dumpdata --exclude=auth --exclude=contenttypes --exclude=sessions --exclude=admin
scripts.db-load-demo-data: docker-compose run --rm web python manage.py loaddata demo-data
scripts.db-migrate: docker-compose run --rm web python manage.py migrate
scripts.dev-init: yarn install && yarn db-migrate && yarn db-load-demo-data
